alert.note: Alert for Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 11:50AM EDT until July 07 at 12:15PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL ESSEX...NORTHWESTERN ADDISON AND SOUTHWESTERN CHITTENDEN COUNTIES... At 1149 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lewis, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include... Essex, Willsboro, Westport, Elizabethtown, Kingsland Bay State Park, Ferrisburgh, Lewis, Fort Cassin Point, Snake Den Harbor, Ship Point, Summer Point, Hunter Bay, North West Bay, Diamond Island, Cannon Point, Porter Bay, Partridge Harbor, Louis Clearing Bay, Fields Bay, and Deerhead. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
